channel.description: A virtual proof that I'm awesome

item.title: Pinelang, hello world!
item.description: A script language on top of Kotlin - So I decided to resurrect an old project of mine to create a small footprint scripting language on top of Kotlin. But why would one do that? HttpServer { hostname: 'localhost' port: 8080 on connection: (resp) { println("Hello world:" + resp.text) } } What is Pinelang? PineLang is a minimalistic,...
